main event: A trained pilot observed a pulsating light in the sky while driving near Mims, Florida on 20 March 1965.
interesting points: The pilot noted the object varied in color rapidly, alternating between almost white to an intense blue.,The object descended multiple times, each time approximately 500 feet.,The object remained motionless for around 30 seconds during the observation.,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes and involved no other vehicles passing during that time.,The pilot estimated the object's altitude to be between 5000 and 6000 feet.
sighted object: a pulsating light in the sky
witness description: a 48-year-old trained pilot, employed by NASA at the Kennedy Space Center
